block.p: BASEBALL Major Leage Baseball Suspended Los Angeles RHP Ismael Valdes for six games and Chicago Cubs RHP Kerry Wood for three and fined them an undisclosed amount for throwing at batters in a game on Aug. 27.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Recalled RHP Sean DePaula from Buffalo of the International League and placed him on the 60-day disabled list. Claimed LHP Eric Dubose off waivers from the Oakland Athletics and optioned him the Buffalo of the International League.

BASEBALL Major Leage Baseball Suspended Los Angeles RHP Ismael Valdes for six games and Chicago Cubs RHP Kerry Wood for three and fined them an undisclosed amount for throwing at batters in a game on Aug. 27.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Recalled RHP Sean DePaula from Buffalo of the International League and placed him on the 60-day disabled list. Claimed LHP Eric Dubose off waivers from the Oakland Athletics and optioned him the Buffalo of the International League.

National League METS--Extended their working agreement with Norfolk of the International League through 2002. CHICAGO CUBS--Signed RHP Jerry Spradlin for the remainder of the season. FLORIDA MARLINS--Signed manager John Boles, bench coach Joe Breeden, pitching coach Rich Dubee, third base coach Fredi Gonzalez, hitting coach Jack Maloof, and infield coach Tony Taylor to one-year contract extensions through the 2002 season. Announced the resignation of first base coach Rusty Kuntz, effective at the end of the season, to become minor league base running and outfield coordinator with the Marlins. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Purchased the contract of LHP Thomas Jacquez from Scranton/Wilkes-Barre of the International League. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Purchased the contract of RHP Brian Smith and OF Adam Hyzdu from Altoona of the Eastern League. Moved RHP Francisco Cordova and RHP Jason Schmidt from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list.

FOOTBALL National Football League ARIZONA CARDINALS--Waived DT Darwin Walker and WR-TE Tywan Mitchell. Added DE Simeon Rice and C Jason Starkey to the active roster. TENNESSEE TITANS--Placed TE Michael Roan on the injured reserve list. Activated TE Mike Leach from the practice squad.
HOCKEY National Hockey League RANGERS--Agreed to terms with D Dale Purinton and D Drew Bannister. BUFFALO SABRES--Re-signed F Erik Rasmussen and D Jason Holland.
